roleset.name: cook in hot oil

example.name: yum
example.text: These are roadside restaurants often called dhabas that *T*-2 serve up recipes of [dal, vegetables and stuffed puries,] deepfried in oil.
example.arg: recipes of [dal, vegetables and stuffed puries,]
